reviewText:
No, the girls don't get naked in this one either. I watched the first, self-titled Ultimate Poker Babes some time ago. And somehow I got the impression (from the description above) that this one would take matters one step further. I was wrong. And I won't buy any more of these.
Still, I can't say this was completely useless. All six of the girls are attractive, especially with almost no clothes on. And it is a genuine poker game. But I would like someone to make a strip poker DVD where the girls actually get naked. How hard could that be?
